page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO SOUTH SELSEY
page.content: {Selsey}once an island is now a lively south coast peninsula village. The 10% of our area which is land,we shall call South Selsey is entirely flat and is protected from the sea by a recently completed{sea wall.}Only part of the coast has a coastal path. The{Lifeboat}and{fishing}play a major part in the life of the village.The community works together to support the Lifeboat and also the{elderly.}The houses in our area tend to be large, older properties which are suitable for conversion into{nursing}or{rest {homes.}The number of these is growing. The extra sunshine we get attracts tourists here and many of these stay at{Pontin's Broadreeds Holiday Camp. {Ornithologists}come to{Selsey Bill}all round the year.
